thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Barclays names Kunal Gandhi as head of corporate broking

title: Barclays names Kunal Gandhi as head of corporate broking
text:
January 5, 2018 / 2:20 PM / in an hour Barclays names Kunal Gandhi as head of corporate broking Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
LONDON (Reuters) - Barclays ( BARC.L ) has appointed Kunal Gandhi as head of corporate broking and Rob Mayhew as his deputy, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Friday. 
Gandhi helped build Barclaysâ€™ corporate broking business by advising clients including insurer Legal & General ( LGEN.L ) and the London Stock Exchange ( LSE.L ), the memo said. 
Corporate broking is a banking business common in Britain but little seen elsewhere and involves lenders providing long-term strategic advice to corporate customers. 
A spokesman for Barclays confirmed the contents of the memo. Reporting By Lawrence White; Editing by Susan Fenton
